# If you are not human, do not edit this file!!!

create a new module called crm

It will display data in 2 diffrent data tables in 2 diffrent tabs inside the module, contacts and outreach logs

the crm_customer apis will be used in the input for for the crm_contacts POST api as a select input with name as label and id as value with a pluss button opening a new modal for adding crm_customer wtih the POST api and a delete button next to the labels.


apis:

DELETE
/crm_contacts/{crm_contacts_id}
Delete crm_contacts record

Authentication: required
